 2024-11032024-10-11DND
ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisReappointment of JOCELYNE THERRIEN of Gatineau, Quebec, as a special adviser to the Minister of National Defence, to serve as External Monitor for the implementation of the Independent External Comprehensive Review recommendations, to hold office during pleasure for a term of one year, effective October 19, 2024.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Reappointment of JOCELYNE THERRIEN of Gatineau, Quebec, as a special adviser to the Minister of National Defence, to serve as External Monitor for the implementation of the Independent External Comprehensive Review recommendations, to hold office during pleasure for a term of one year, effective October 19, 2024.
